name: Wings of Angels
description:
Take off on the Wings of Angels with Kenji Nakahara, his friends, and his copilots!

Hundreds of years into the future, a mysterious race known as the Sierrans has come pouring through the jump point - and humanity is up against the ropes. With Kenji and his friend pressed into service, you'll get to make every single decision for Kenji during what will come to be called "The Battle of Epsilon Iridani." From his choices in the cockpit to how he navigates his relationship with his friends and copilots, your decisions MATTER in this visual novel from ERODH C & C.

And speaking of relationships - if you thought navigating life as a single guy was hard, just way until you try it in the middle of a war! The results can be anywhere from hilarious to sexy as we combine the ecchi genre with epic sci-fi storytelling. From your old friend Ayako to your red-hot Commanding Officer, your relationships evolve naturally with your choices. Don't forget: the fleet is small and your reputation proceeds you! And with 31 unlockable CGs and some very sexy finales to each romance plot, the Angels on your wing will give you plenty of reason to come back for more! As an added bonus, you'll get additional unlockable CGs in the form of an ending tracker - visual novel explorers will never be left to wonder if they've seen it all, yet.

Wings of Angels does not contain nudity or explicit descriptions of sexual activity.
